9-Volt battery can be recycled at e-waste collection points, located here. (ALBA E-waste recycling bins).

Remember to tape the ends of the battery and seal leaking batteries in a leak-proof container or bag first to prevent short-circuit or fire incidents.

Button cell battery can be recycled at e-waste collection points, located here. (ALBA E-waste recycling bins).

Remember to tape the ends of the battery and seal leaking batteries in a leak-proof container or bag first to prevent short-circuit or fire incidents.
